sentences.en: Better insulation of your home will help to reduce heating bills.
sentences.cn: 增加房子的隔热性能会有助于减少供暖费用。

sentences.en: He debated heating up the pot first before his friends came.
sentences.cn: 他考虑在朋友们到来之前先把火锅烧热.

sentences.en: High electricity bills point to a poor heating system or bad insulation.
sentences.cn: 高额电费开支说明供暖系统不足或建筑隔热材料不良。

sentences.en: I'm cold. Turn the heating up.
sentences.cn: 我觉得冷，把暖气温度调高一点。

sentences.en: If the pressure is too low, the heating system will act up.
sentences.cn: 如果压力太低, 供暖系统就会出毛病.

sentences.en: Old people often try to economize on heating, thus endangering their health.
sentences.cn: 老年人常常想方设法节约用暖气，结果损害了他们的健康。

sentences.en: Older people should not skimp on food or heating.
sentences.cn: 老人吃饭和取暖不应吝惜。

sentences.en: Some bright spark turned the heating off last night!
sentences.cn: 某个聪明过头的家伙昨晚把暖气关了。

sentences.en: The heating is on a time switch.
sentences.cn: 暖气靠定时开关自动供热。

sentences.en: The school pays for heating and the maintenance of the buildings.
sentences.cn: 学校负担这些大楼的供热和维修费用。

sentences.en: They will install a heating and lighting system in our house.
sentences.cn: 他们将在我们家装上供热供电系统.

sentences.en: We wanted to reduce the cost of heating and air-conditioning.
sentences.cn: 我们想减少供暖与空调的开支。

sentences.en: While the water was heating she decided to shake out the carpet.
sentences.cn: 趁着烧水的时候，她决定将地毯抖抖干净。

sentences.en: With its unique heating element it makes perfect coffee.
sentences.cn: 其独特的电热元件使它能够煮出非常美味的咖啡。
